message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the given income statement.

In an income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period. This includes the cost of inventory items that have been sold to customers.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that the "Cost of Goods Sold" is listed with a value of 1,015,000.00 as of 2024-02-05.

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 1,015,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1015000.00'} }
```
